alert.note: Alert for York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 6:22PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN ADAMS AND SOUTHWESTERN YORK COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM EDT... At 621 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hanover, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Hanover, Parkville, Codorus, McSherrystown, Spring Grove, Glen Rock, Pennville, Jacobus, Bonneauville, New Oxford, Loganville, Abbottstown, Seven Valleys and Glenville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
